name: D-RUNT
description: D-RUN, Find Your Running Buddy Near You D-RUN, a WEB3.0 Running NFT project; Run together and earn greater rewards with WEB3.0 Running NFT project, D-RUN! Built on a strong community, D-RUN goes beyond walking and jogging. We aim for “Marathoning”, where we run ‘together’ and ‘alongside’ to achieve the goal. By strengthening the solidarity amongst the users and providing the enjoyment of 'Marathoning Together', D-RUN and D-RUN users will participate in Asia’s representative marathon, the Seoul International Marathon, also known as the "Dong-A Ilbo Seoul Marathon,“ where thousands of marathoners participate. D-RUN strives to create the largest global marathoning community together with the users in our ecosystem.
